data.app_name: Firedrake Crypts Of The Golem King
data.description:
The Necromages of Ozmot are recruiting the dark forces of evil to find ancient and powerful artifacts scattered throughout the kingdom of Dorin.

Discover magic items and weapons and go on quests  obtaining new abilities, all the while trying to uncover the sinister plot of the Necromagesof Ozmot and their pursuit to exhume the long vanquished Red Dragons.

Will you brave the dark horrors of the crypt, solve it's riddles and recover the weapons and magics for the High Septs of Gilifax   before  the unlifeless minions Of Ozmot discover them? 

Playtime: 2-3 Hours
Specifically optimized for Q1
Optimized for accessibility (multimodal movement, high contrast graphics)

NOTE:
The Crypts Of The Golem King is an EXTREME VR experience.   Featuring fast paced free roaming 1st person movements, hard hitting melee combat, jump scares, 3D heights and claustrophobic environments. 
 It is intended for advanced VR users.

changelog.change_log:
Release Notes 1.18
Major fixes in version 1.17 (see 1.17 release notes)
Fixed camera issues on level "tree"
Added smashiable vases with random loot

Release notes 1.17
Fixed entitlement check by removing script from none destructive object and added to static game object in level two.
Removed android.storage and android. phone_manage_calls from app permissions
Turned on fast turn (40dg)  in joystick movement.  
Enabled camera smoothing  +5 for fast turn to address reports of motion sickness
Rebaked lighting, bumped up ao 1.85 to mitigate shadow smearing.
Normalized all monsters and dynamic objects for light probes.
Tweaked various combat A.I. across all levels for playability
Added 3 new zombie  motion/animation controllers.
Fixed level E monster/gate collider issue.
Fixed various level collider issues for playbility.
Fixed level 14a secret area occlusion issue.
Fixed some spelling errors in scrolls and added text for quest clarifications.
Fixed all theraic potion pickup bounding boxes.
Optimized level geometry and picked up 3-5 FPS.

Fixed various level 
collider issues.
fixed android manifest file to allow "phone_manage_calls"   Don't ask me why, but this permission is need to run the app on quest 1
fixed various ai animations.
updated final battle.  (needs some work.  balancing, more spectacular eye candy)
